description:
Located in Manhattan's Upper East Side, a very safe neighborhood. Attractions within easy walking distance are Central Park, The Metropolitan Museum of Art, The Guggenheim Museum. The 4/5/6 subway line is a 5 minute walk away, and the new 2nd Avenue 'Q' line is now operational.

A variety of restaurants, grocery stores, and drug stores abound.

The apartment has a twin bed and pull out sofa bed to accomodate 2 to 3 guests. Separate full kitchen and bathroom are available.

Access to the entire apartment, including a full kitchen and bathroom and closet space

You'll have the whole apartment to yourself

Conveniently located near Central Park, the Met, the Guggenheim. Lots of restaurants, bars, grocery and drug stores.

The 4, 5, 6 trains are a 5 minute walk away many bus lines a block away. The new 2nd Avenue 'Q' line is 3 blocks away and now operational.
name: Cozy Manhattan studio near Central Park
review: Le studio de Manu correspond bien à la description. Il est sécuritaire, accueillant et calme. Il est aussi extrêmement bien situé. L'endroit est simple mais il ne manque de rien, ou presque: celles et ceux qui aiment prendre le premier café du matin sans avoir à sortir de l'appartement noteront qu'il n'y a pas de cafetière sur place (nous avions la nôtre). Il n'y a pas non plus, du moins pas en ce moment, de coupes à vin (seulement de très grands verres). Mis à part ces détails, nous avons passé un très bon séjour et je recommande l'endroit sans hésitation.
